name: Floppy Worm
description:
JUMP and DODGE through an endless FUN adventure in this simple but addictive game!
//////////////////////////////////////
Dodge the rocks, unfriendly critters, and over 100 tricky traps, as you find all the treasure you can before you FLOP!

Play as Floppy, a worm who goes where no worm has gone before! Conquer 30+ tricky obstacles, as you explore 5 unique worlds! Collect treasure, and unlock boosts, and beat the hiscores!
Each mysterious world has its own creatures, who dislike guests... are you ready to start you adventure?

This game is hours of fun- try it out! With over 350,000 downloads, over 100 million plays, and a 5 star rating, Floppy Worm is a game everyone loves!
